text: The theory of relativity was developed by Albert Einstein in 1905. It consists of special and general relativity, fundamentally changing our understanding of space and time.
Quantum mechanics is a fundamental theory in physics that describes the behavior of matter and energy at atomic and subatomic scales.
The Renaissance was a period in European history marking the transition from the Middle Ages to modernity, spanning the 14th to the 17th century.
Machine learning is a field of artificial intelligence that uses statistical techniques to give computer systems the ability to learn from data.
The human brain contains approximately 86 billion neurons, each connected to thousands of other neurons, forming an incredibly complex network.
